channel.title: Drops help?
channel.description:
How do i add in drops , take drops away and add new npc`s that give drops?
any help appreciated ,
- Lewis.

item.title: Drops help?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

[quote=“Lewis), post:11, topic:300334”][quote author=Epic Ancient link=topic=396619.msg2945549#msg2945549 date=1252193395]

Go to Config and npc drops

---------NPCID–DROP-#—%RateOfGettingDrop---------------------------
npcdrop = 2263 5509 1 10

Thank-you!

but can you explain the numbers ,

---------NPCID--DROP-#---%RateOfGettingDrop--------------------------- npcdrop = 2263 5509 1 10

What does the 2263 , 5509 , 1 , 10 mean , what does each number do? i realise the first 2 numbers are coords and 1 is the monster id?

npcdrop = NPCID  ITEMID   ITEMAMOUNT   DROPPERCENTAGE

No need to put in bones, because if you don’t get the drop, the drop percentage is telling it to make it bones, if it’s low.
–Basically, if you get the 90% of the chance of not getting the drop, you get bones.
[/quote]

Thanks alot , its taken me ages to find out such a simple thing :)[/quote]
You’re very welcome. If you need help adding it in, or making it work BETTER, request me on teamviewer. I’m on quite often. (As am now)
I’m also good with:
Quests
Item Pricing (MOSTLY)
Custom Making
Somewhat Modeling
Making items equip where they’re supposed to
and Object placement/clicking object actions,
in both Delta and Nondelta servers. Delta, just less info with. But I’m good with it nonetheless ^^"

Read full topic

No need to put in bones, because if you don’t get the drop, the drop percentage is telling it to make it bones, if it’s low.

npcdrop = NPCID  ITEMID   ITEMAMOUNT   DROPPERCENTAGE

No need to put in bones, because if you don’t get the drop, the drop percentage is telling it to make it bones, if it’s low.
